item.description:
Our next meeting on Tuesday, October 13 will be at 7:15 PM (note time change) at the large meeting room in the Reading Public Library. Our last meeting was at the Reading Senior Center on Pleasant Street and everyone liked it much better than the library so I will try to rent that room for future meetings.

I would like to ask all of you to think of becoming an assistant organizer of the meeting so monthly meetings will always be possible. With the winter months approaching I don't intend to be flying as much and would like you to have meetings regularly.

Donations were enough to cover my costs last month and I thank you all for donating. If levels keep up I will be in the black for the first time in two years!

I am having many issues with computer and e-mails from AOL. If you need to contact me call 623-251-7547 or e-mail me at my new e-mail btzee6@gmail.com.

Thanks,

betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia October Meetup
